data.persona: I live in the village with other people. I am a citizen and work normal jobs in the town. I am a productive member of society.
data.description:
You are in the Jungle.
Full of natural beauty and danger, the jungle holds many rewards and risks. From beautiful awe inspiring fauna to the worlds most deadly creatures.
The creature is here.

You are carrying a purse, and wearing a Simple, tattered garments and a Cloak.

data.short_motivation: I need to free my hands
data.mid_motivation: I need to ward off the creature
data.long_motivation: I must travel through the Jungle to get to our neighboring kingdom to buy a few of the trader's unique wares
